attributes.action: Introduce legislation that:- a) Makes the promotion of any business, product or service by Unsolicited Commercial Email (SPAM) illegal; and b) Makes it illegal for Finance Companies to provide Debit/Credit Card Merchant facilities to Organistions that advertise using SPAM.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Over 90% of all mails received in the UK are SPAM. This creates an enormous waste of resources in transmitting, processing and dealing with such messages. It it practically impossible to deal with the organisations who arrange the mass mailings but the Organisations who advertise in this way do have a geographical presence and do have arrangements with Banks to process payments made by Credit/Debit card. Cutting off payments to the advertising businesses will soon make most commercial SPAM pointless.
